name: Solar System (itch) (merecat)
description:
This is my Solar System project. I added the following elements:

  • Mercury
  • Venus
  • Mars
  • Jupiter
  • Saturn
  • Uranus

I attempted to move the camera back and expand the frustum on both cameras to fit all planets, but it became hard to see the smaller planets on the scene. Therefore, you won't be able to see Saturn and Uranus.

Credits:
Created by Ana Mendes
